welcome_message:
ğŸŒ¤ï¸ Welcome to **ShoPogoda**!

This is a live demo: [More information](https://valpere.github.io/projects/shopogoda/)

Your personal weather assistant for accurate forecasts, air quality monitoring, and custom weather alerts.

To get started:
â€¢ Use /weather to check current conditions
â€¢ Use /forecast for 5-day predictions
â€¢ Use /setlocation to save your location
â€¢ Use /settings to customize your experience

Type /help for all available commands.
